titles.title: A resolution to commend the Razorbacks of the University of Arkansas at Fayetteville for having won the 1994 NCAA Men's Basketball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/14/1994--Introduced. Commends the Razorbacks of the University of Arkansas for winning the 1994 National Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Championship.
